attributes.title: Hate hate hate.
attributes.review: This app was one of the worst things ive ever downloaded. Not only was the leader a disgrace, it actually created so many more problems for the phone.

attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review: This app is ignorant garbage...... when I opened the app my phone charger literally caught fire bec of all the rage. This app MUST be deleted immediately so NOBODY else can see it and have the same horrible, disgusting, gross, yucky experience of their life. GARBAGE APP

attributes.title: How is this app still here
attributes.review: I really don’t get how this app is still here, literally so terrible, it’s horrible, like, really really trash, I hate it so much, App Store should take down this app NOW

attributes.title: Drains my battery faster than small town gossip gets to the knitting club
attributes.review: Like this presidency, this app doesn’t know when to stop running.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: This app literally killed my cat and started my house on fire. It’s the worst app to exist. I do not recommend getting it unless you wanna end up with a dead cat and no house.

attributes.title: Trump is ga-
attributes.review: Broooo this app stole 15,000 from me and now I can’t buy a dinosaur, and it also said that this app that it will make u fell good but in the last 24 hours my wife got murdered and my dog and cat died and my goldfish is blue fish

attributes.title: Disgrace

attributes.title: Horrible and terrible!!
attributes.review: I got the app and five seconds in it glitched and after my phone was acting like I poured water on it the contents of this apps are horrible I don not like it at all.😡

attributes.title: yikes 🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: trump kind sir this app made my fetus explode i do not know what type of cheap app this is but i have never had something like this happen. you also caused my house to be struck by lightning which scared my giraffe ( his name is donkey) who bit my elephant (named giraffe) who stomped on my donkey(named elephant). so now my house is like a zoo and i need to get the remains of my donkey off the floor. i hope you’re happy.😡

attributes.title: oompa loompa did not satisfy
attributes.review: as i downloaded the app and opened it the site of the cheeto him self startled me causing me to faint when i woke up and all i could see was cheeto puff himself the doctor said i could live my life seeing him for the rest of my life of get my eyes removed it was and easy choice but i do not recommend getting this app unless you don’t want eyeballs thank you❤️🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟
